meanings.definition: Moving unsteadily from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The saggering ship made me feel dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The saggering toddler struggled to keep their balance.
meanings.sent3: The saggering penguin waddled comically across the ice.
meanings.sent4: The saggering tree branches swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The saggering tightrope walker teetered on the thin line.

meanings.sent1: The magician's saggering trick left the audience speechless.
meanings.sent2: The saggering news of the surprise party spread quickly.
meanings.sent3: The saggering plot twist in the movie caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: The saggering fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The saggering sight of the meteor shower amazed us all.

meanings.sent1: I saggering down the uneven path in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The tired hiker saggering towards the campsite.
meanings.sent3: The drunk man saggering out of the bar after a long night.
meanings.sent4: The injured dog saggering back home after getting lost.
meanings.sent5: The old man saggering along with his cane for support.
